data.message: It’s not visiting Leeds City centre this year, one of the biggest cities in the UK... seriously?!!!

replies.message: Hi Andy, each year, we try to cover as much of the country as we can but unfortunately, we can't visit every single town and city. To ensure that as many people as possible get the opportunity to experience the tour we update the route every year to add new locations.
Coca-Cola Ahhhh, ok I suppose that does make sense.... although NGL, the thought of holidays not coming to us this year is slightly... sad. I did wonder if it was because we’ve been bad. ☹️
